Interests

Apart from being a backend developer, I enjoy spending time outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months in Wales, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, am an aspiring chef, and spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest advancements in backend development. I also enjoy enhancing my problem-solving skills through competitive programming challenges.
